Oh hai! My name is Matty and I'm a giraffe …Seriously, just see me run

I'm a front-end web developer at Mintleaf / Websilk. I pride myself on building device agnostic sites with modern best practices.

I love CSS, semantic HTML, standards-driven development, accessibility, the mobile web and of course using buzzwords.

I believe I'm up to my second third re-design of this site. I am pushing myself on this project to:

  • use git for version control
  • use a CMS that is new to me ( Jekyll )
  • use Octopress on-top of said Jekyll
  • write and document the process and pitfalls while building ( also any sublime snippets, mixins etc)

Blerg

14 May
A SASS mixin and method for getting image sprites to appear in Windows High Contrast mode for accessibility

Jekyll up and running

28 Apr
Or "Octopress, I'm sorry I left you". My site is now running on Jekyll after the decision to leave WordPress and databases behind.
